Storyline: 
The action-adventure tale revolving around the legendary German 
brothers Jacob and Wilhelm Grimm is set to start shooting around 
Prague in June. Written by The Ring scribe Ehren Kruger, the 
fictional plot has the folklore collectors, now called Jake and 
Will, traveling from village to village pretending to protect 
townsfolk from enchanted creatures and pulling off exorcisms. 
They are put to the test when they encounter a real magical curse, 
requiring genuine courage.
